did.langmaterial: Bulk of materials in English. Two items written in German.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Any rights (including copyright and related rights to publicity and privacy) held by Polytechnic University in all its forms are maintained by New York University. Permission to publish or reproduce materials in this collection must be secured from the Poly Archives. Please contact the Poly Archives, polyarchives@nyu.edu, 646-997-3530.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Poly Archives Frame Rack; RG 056; bin number; frame number or item identifier; Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, New York University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Poly Frame Rack contains material from 1848 to 2011. This material includes photographs, portraits, plaques, proclamations, drawings, and diplomas. Shelf 1 and 5 include materials that are accessioned into the Herman Mark Papers, Shelf 2 includes materials that are accessioned into the Ernst Weber Papers, Shelf 6 includes materials that are accessioned into the Administrative Papers of the President and Chancellor George Bugliariello, and Shelf 5 and 8 include materials that are accessioned into the Jerry Hutlin Papers. The Poly Archives Frame Rack is located in the Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology.
